<?php require_once 'wordpress/wp-load.php'; $base = '/wordpress/wp-content/plugins/data-liberation/';
require $base . 'vendor/autoload.php';
try {
$arguments = [
'--stderr',
'--testdox',
'--configuration',
$base . 'phpunit.xml'
];
if ( defined('PHPUNIT_FILTER') && PHPUNIT_FILTER ) {
$arguments[] = '--filter';
$arguments[] = PHPUNIT_FILTER;
}
$res = (new PHPUnit\TextUI\Application())->run($arguments);
if ( $res !== 0 ) {
trigger_error('PHPUnit failed', E_USER_ERROR);
}
} catch (Throwable $e) {
trigger_error('PHPUnit failed: ' . $e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
}
;
